apiClassifier.shortdesc: A LSOutputStream represents a byte stream destination for the XML output.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
A LSOutputStream represents a byte stream destination for the XML output.
Note: For Java, LSInputStream is bound to the java.io.InputStream type. For ECMAScript, LSInputStream is bound to Object.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A LSWriter represents a character stream for the XML output.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
A LSWriter represents a character stream for the XML output.
Note: For Java, LSInputStream is bound to the java.io.InputStream type. For ECMAScript, LSInputStream is bound to Object.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A LSInputStream represents a reference to a byte stream source of an XML input.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
A LSInputStream represents a reference to a byte stream source of an XML input.
Note: For Java, LSInputStream is bound to the java.io.InputStream type. For ECMAScript, LSInputStream is bound to Object.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A LSReader represents a character stream for the XML input.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
A LSReader represents a character stream for the XML input.
Note: For Java, LSInputStream is bound to the java.io.InputStream type. For ECMAScript, LSInputStream is bound to Object.
